name: pebble_auto_config
description: PAC is a simple configuration page for pebble watchface configuration. PAC uses url parameters to create a config page on the fly using JS.

scripts.package: npm run copy:all && npm run package:css && npm run package:js
scripts.package:css: npm run combine:css && npm run uncss && npm run copy:css
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:bootstrap && npm run copy:jquery && npm run copy:handlebars
scripts.copy:dist: cp ./main.css dist/$npm_package_version && cp ./main.css dist/$npm_package_version && cp ./_index.html dist/$npm_package_version/index.html
scripts.postversion: npm run package && npm run replace:markup && mkdir ./dist/$npm_package_version && npm run copy:dist && cp ./main.css dist/$npm_package_version && cp ./main.js dist/$npm_package_version && cp ./_index.html dist/$npm_package_version/index.html && npm run cleanup:files

author: Greg Thoman
